en.name: Straight to the Grave
en.effect: All Dinosaur, Zombie, and Rock monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.

fr.name: Direct dans la Tombe
fr.effect: Tous les monstres Dinosaure, Zombie et Rocher sur le Terrain gagnent 200 ATK/DEF.

de.name: Direkt ins Grab
de.effect: Alle Dinosaurier-, Zombie- und Fels-Monster auf dem Spielfeld erhalten 200 ATK/DEF.

it.name: Dritto nella Tomba
it.effect: Tutti i mostri Dinosauro, Zombie e Roccia sul Terreno guadagnano 200 ATK/DEF.

pt.name: Destino: Cemitério
pt.effect: Todos os monstros Dinossauro, Zumbi e Rocha no campo ganham 200 de ATK/DEF.

es.name: Directo a la Tumba
es.effect: Todos los monstruo Dinosaurio, Zombi y Roca en el Campo ganan 200 ATK/DEF.
